text: #RCGPCouncil member: in 2015 14m people living in poverty. There is an opportunity for GPs - identifying effective interventions is key but to do this we need accurate data from practices to identify those in need

text: #RCGPCouncil member: GPs have a moral duty to speak out against health inequality and social injustice, but we shouldn't medicalise social inequality - shouldn't be taken away from meeting medical needs of patients, especially with limited workforce capacity

text: #RCGPCouncil member: health inequalities have always existed, but #COVID19 has held a spotlight to them, and there are opportunities to build back back and try to address them. We want to highlight practical things that can be done to address this historically challenging area.
